mapper.insert: insert into BOOKWRITER.M_STAFF (STAFF_CODE, STAFF_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, POSITION, SALARY, START_WORK_DATE, EDUCATION_LEVEL, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, REMARK, DEPT_CODE) values (#{staffCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{startWorkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{educationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update BOOKWRITER.M_STAFF set STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALARY = #{salary,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, START_WORK_DATE = #{startWorkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDUCATION_LEVEL = #{educationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STAFF_CODE = #{staffCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select STAFF_CODE, STAFF_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, POSITION, SALARY, START_WORK_DATE, EDUCATION_LEVEL, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, REMARK, DEPT_CODE from BOOKWRITER.M_STAFF where STAFF_CODE = #{staffCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
select STAFF_CODE, STAFF_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, POSITION, SALARY, START_WORK_DATE, EDUCATION_LEVEL, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, REMARK, DEPT_CODE from BOOKWRITER.M_STAFF
